title: How to Bake Breakfast Cereal Bars

steps.headline: Melt butter in a small saucepan.
Mix together cake mix and oats in a large bowl
Stir in the melted butter until the mixture is crumbly.
Measure half of this mixture (about 3 cups) into a greased 9 x 13-inch pan.
Press firmly into pan to cover bottom.
Combine preserves and water; spoon over crumb mixture in pan, and spread evenly.
Bake at 375 °F (191 °C) for 20 minutes or until the top is light brown.
Cool completely before cutting into bars.

text: Preheat oven to 375ºF/190ºC.  Melt butter in a small saucepan.  Mix together cake mix and oats in a large bowl  Stir in the melted butter until the mixture is crumbly.  Measure half of this mixture (about 3 cups) into a greased 9 x 13-inch pan.  Press firmly into pan to cover bottom.  Combine preserves and water; spoon over crumb mixture in pan, and spread evenly.  Bake at 375 °F (191 °C) for 20 minutes or until the top is light brown.  Cool completely before cutting into bars.  Finished.
